column5: I really appreciate you taking the heat off of me for a minute Bubba!!!  ... that's the kind of "stand-up" dude you are!!!   ... and if one more person says something bad aboot you... I will personally come up there and bash their nads in with a Wiffle Ball Bat, whilst they roll around in unmitigated agony on the permafrost type tundra!!!
hmm that offer of a nad-bash is tempting.  If it is still available in the morning I might take you up on that.  I haven't been hit with a wiffle ball bat in that location for years.
that'll cost ya extra..lol You're a freak...lmao  I may need a place to stay if I get to Talladega, dawg, so i'll be glad to deflect for ya.
THE "RACE" is next weekend and again sometime in October I think... shoot me a PM if you're headed this way!
